messages.title: Delivering for Wimbledon
messages.content: Local champion Shas Sheehan has a record of action for people in Wimbledon. Shas campaigned on key local issues including stopping plans for a waste treatment centre on the Rainbow industrial estate and maintaining funding for the freedom pass.

messages.title: OUR NHS...AT RISK
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are committed to preserving the NHS and other key local services. Shas is campaigning against plans to close A&E and maternity units at Kingston Hospital. Over 15,000 have joined the Save Kingston Hospital facebook group.

messages.title: Help the Lib Dems win
messages.content: Please help Shas Sheehan and the local Lib Dems win for local people by printing and returning this form.

messages.title: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
messages.content: Nick Clegg's tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn—cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposing plans to close A&E and maternity units at Kingston Hospital, and committed to preserving the NHS and other key local services.
Campaigning on local issues including stopping a waste treatment centre and maintaining the freedom pass.
Supporting Nick Clegg's tax plan which includes no tax on the first £10,000 of earnings, reducing most tax bills by £700.

issues.economy: Tax Plan with no tax on the first £10,000 of earnings, reducing most tax bills by £700.
issues.health: Committed to preserving the NHS and opposing plans to close A&E and maternity units at Kingston Hospital.

quotes.text: We've lived through this mistake for years now... The reality is [the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller...
quotes.source: David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners Daily Telegraph

quotes.text: Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS
Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss
